subject: Harness Racing
Genetics and Heredity
Research
Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Researchers in Sweden have discovered a single gene that could explain why some horses can trot or pace and why others cannot, a finding that could greatly affect harness racing.
snippet: Researchers in Sweden have discovered a single gene that could explain why some horses can trot or pace and why others cannot, a finding that could greatly affect harness racing.
